<h3 id="X32305">X(32305) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: TRINH TO WALSMITH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (SB+SC)*((9*R^2-3*SW)*S^2+(27*R^2-3*SA-4*SW)*SA*SW)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(32305) = 3*X(3)-X(2930) = X(3)-3*X(5621) = 5*X(3)-X(32254) = X(67)-3*X(20126) = 3*X(67)-X(32272) = 3*X(74)+X(895) = 2*X(74)+X(9976) = 2*X(895)-3*X(9976) = X(895)-3*X(11579) = X(2930)-9*X(5621) = 2*X(2930)-3*X(12584) = X(2930)+3*X(16010) = 5*X(2930)-3*X(32254) = 6*X(5621)-X(12584) = 3*X(5621)+X(16010) = 15*X(5621)-X(32254) = X(12584)+2*X(16010) = 5*X(12584)-2*X(32254) = 5*X(16010)+X(32254) = 9*X(20126)-X(32272) = 3*X(20417)-X(32257)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(110).</p>
<p>X(32305) lies on these lines:
{3,67}, {4,20301}, {6,10620}, {23,9140}, {24,32250}, {30,25328}, {35,32259}, {36,32286}, {74,511}, {98,20404}, {110,5092}, {125,1995}, {146,14561}, {182,4550}, {185,575}, {265,29012}, {376,32255}, {378,5095}, {399,5085}, {541,5476}, {576,2781}, {690,13233}, {1177,6000}, {1350,15041}, {1428,7727}, {1503,7575}, {1511,17508}, {1691,14901}, {1974,12292}, {1986,19124}, {2071,32244}, {2330,19470}, {2393,16219}, {2777,23049}, {2836,3579}, {2854,3098}, {3448,7492}, {3520,32234}, {3564,12901}, {5050,25556}, {5097,10752}, {5655,10168}, {5907,7550}, {6200,32291}, {6396,32292}, {6698,11178}, {6800,32315}, {7530,18381}, {7545,15027}, {7555,12359}, {7556,11457}, {7688,32277}, {7689,14984}, {7691,15021}, {7728,19130}, {8546,16510}, {9517,13247}, {9818,32300}, {10249,15141}, {10510,19402}, {10605,32251}, {10606,32276}, {10628,19150}, {10645,32301}, {10646,32302}, {10733,29323}, {11061,11179}, {11410,32240}, {11430,32245}, {11438,32246}, {11454,32248}, {11468,32249}, {11572,15044}, {11643,19905}, {12017,12308}, {12106,20379}, {12244,25320}, {12317,25406}, {12902,25330}, {14677,29181}, {14810,15055}, {14865,22330}, {14982,15061}, {15116,23329}, {16042,25561}, {18931,32241}, {19192,32258}, {19454,32293}, {19455,32294}, {19506,23300}, {20127,29317}, {21663,32260}</p>
<p>
X(32305) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these lines: {i,j}: {3, 16010}, {6, 10620}, {74, 11579}, {9970, 15054}, {12244, 31670}<br>
X(32305) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 20301), (110, 5092), (3098, 12041), (3818, 125), (5655, 10168), (7728, 19130), (9970, 575), (9976, 11579), (10752, 5097), (12584, 3), (14982, 24206), (16510, 8546), (19140, 182), (19506, 23300), (32271, 15118), (32273, 25328), (32274, 20379)<br>
X(32305) = circumperp conjugate of X(8724)<br>
X(32305) = circumtangential isogonal conjugate of X(23)<br>
X(32305) = inverse of X(14830) in the circumcircle<br>
X(32305) = X(1156)-of-Trinh-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(32305) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5621, 16010, 3), (5622, 9970, 575), (5622, 15054, 9970)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
